description: Unsubscribes a user or a group from their pricing tier in an Amazon Q Business application. An unsubscribed user or group loses all Amazon Q Business feature access at the start of next month.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application for which the subscription is being cancelled.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business subscription being cancelled.

nested_items.name: subscriptionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Q Business subscription being cancelled.

nested_items.name: currentSubscription
nested_items.description: The type of your current Amazon Q Business subscription.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of an Amazon Q Business subscription.

nested_items.name: nextSubscription
nested_items.description: The type of the Amazon Q Business subscription for the next month.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of an Amazon Q Business subscription.
